text: Hecataeus (Ἑκαταῖος) is a Greek name shared by several historical figures: * Hecataeus of Miletus (born c. 550 BC), historian * Hecataeus of Cardia (fl. 323 BC), tyrant of the city of Cardia * Hecataeus of Abdera (born c. 300 BC), philosopher and historian * Hecataeus of Eretria (born c. 300 BC), historian * Hecataeus of Mytilene (born c. 100 BC), sculptor ==See also== * Hecataeus (crater), a large lunar impact crater near the eastern limb of the Moon
title: Hecataeus
